013package org.apache.juneau.urlencoding.annotation;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.*;
016import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
017import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
018import org.apache.juneau.urlencoding.*;
019
020/**
021 * Utility classes and methods for the {@link UrlEncodingConfig @UrlEncodingConfig} annotation.
022 *
023 * <ul class='seealso'>
024 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.UrlEncodingDetails">URL-Encoding Details</a>
025 * </ul>
026 */
027public class UrlEncodingConfigAnnotation {
028
029   /**
030    * Applies {@link UrlEncodingConfig} annotations to a {@link org.apache.juneau.urlencoding.UrlEncodingSerializer.Builder}.
031    */
032   public static class SerializerApply extends AnnotationApplier<UrlEncodingConfig,UrlEncodingSerializer.Builder> {
033
034      /**
035       * Constructor.
036       *
037       * @param vr The resolver for resolving values in annotations.
038       */
039      public SerializerApply(VarResolverSession vr) {
040         super(UrlEncodingConfig.class, UrlEncodingSerializer.Builder.class, vr);
041      }
042
043      @Override
044      public void apply(AnnotationInfo<UrlEncodingConfig> ai, UrlEncodingSerializer.Builder b) {
045         UrlEncodingConfig a = ai.inner();
046
047         bool(a.expandedParams()).ifPresent(x -> b.expandedParams(x));
048      }
049   }
050
051   /**
052    * Applies {@link UrlEncodingConfig} annotations to a {@link org.apache.juneau.urlencoding.UrlEncodingParser.Builder}.
053    */
054   public static class ParserApply extends AnnotationApplier<UrlEncodingConfig,UrlEncodingParser.Builder> {
055
056      /**
057       * Constructor.
058       *
059       * @param vr The resolver for resolving values in annotations.
060       */
061      public ParserApply(VarResolverSession vr) {
062         super(UrlEncodingConfig.class, UrlEncodingParser.Builder.class, vr);
063      }
064
065      @Override
066      public void apply(AnnotationInfo<UrlEncodingConfig> ai, UrlEncodingParser.Builder b) {
067         UrlEncodingConfig a = ai.inner();
068
069         bool(a.expandedParams()).ifPresent(x -> b.expandedParams(x));
070      }
071   }
072}
